title: bug spam help
body:
I got a bug spam and files error
I would have join back in to the game if not for the file error it keep happening to me
 now I got 20 mins ban for 5 game and demo from b2 to b3 it not fair and I reported bug spam you guy should make it so it didn't count it suck.......atlest un ban me please

replies.body:
We had some service issues last night that was causing some disconnections from the servers and preventing login shortly after 9:00pm PDT. It was resolved a bit after the issues started, prior to our scheduled maintenance.

If you're still having this issue, please provide a bit more detail on what errors or behavior you're seeing. Thanks!
